settings.push_1_heading: Bottle Aversion: Why Does My Baby Refuse To Be Bottle-Fed?
settings.push_1_subheading: A baby bottle-feeding aversion is one of the most stressful situations a new parent can face, but it is common. Click to find out what you can do to help your baby, as Mamamade talks through understanding bottle aversion, how it can affect your daily lifestyle, the signs to look out for, causes and treatment.
settings.push_2_heading: How to Cut Foods Safely for Baby-Led Weaning
settings.push_2_subheading: Let's get into the basics of baby-led weaning! Let's talk about important topics, from weaning safety, how to cut food for babies around 6 to 10 months and ways that you can help develop your baby's fine motor skills. We help parents who wish to follow the baby-led weaning method understand how to do so safely.

settings.push_3_subheading: When it's done right, frozen food can be more nutritious, delicious, convenient and sustainable

settings.heading:
Right food. 
Right time.
settings.text: Packed with a wide variety of nutrient-rich ingredients, our food pouches can be steamed, microwaved, mashed or pureed in moments.

settings.title: Do you cater to allergies?
settings.answer:
Yes! Since the earliest days of Mamamade, we've worked so hard to offer families a wide range of meals that would suit the full spectrum of preferences and dietary requirements.

Today, our meals are made in a dedicated facility that is completely free from milk, eggs, peanuts, tree nuts, fish, shellfish, and soya.

Please be aware that we have introduced gluten into a select number of our toddler meals to offer parents more choice. Our kitchen currently handles a spice mix that contains mustard - this spice mix is only used in our Veggie Millet Bites. We also use celery in some of our meals. Although our chefs take great care when preparing all of our meals, we don't have separate areas in our kitchen, so there is still a small risk of cross-contamination with these allergens.

You can find more information on our gluten inclusion here.

We are updating all Mamamade packaging to reflect the above, however, if you have a meal with old packaging, please rest assured that our meals have always been produced in a facility that is free from the allergens listed above.

settings.title: How long do the meals last?
settings.answer:
Our meals stay fresh in your freezer for up to 4 months. By flash-freezing all meals, we're able to keep your food fresh, safe and nutrient-dense.

Once cooked, they can be refrigerated and heated again once in 24 hours.

settings.title: What do the different stages mean?
settings.answer:
We know every baby is ready for different textures at different times, so these are simply guidelines - to make it easier for you to decide what's right for your child.

All of our meals are suitable from 6 months, and offering your baby a later stage meal is not unsafe for them if your child doesn't struggle with the texture.

Stage 1: Smooth single and multi-ingredient purees. These are great for little ones just getting started with solids (4+ months)

Stage 2: Textured mixes designed to be pureed, mashed or left whole (6+ months)

Stage 3: Chunkier, more complex mixes designed to be pureed, mashed or left whole (7+ months)

Finger Foods: Nutrient-dense bites and sticks (7+ months)

settings.title: Can I select different meals for each delivery?
settings.answer:
With our 40 flavours using 80+ ingredients, we encourage you to work your way through our entire menu!

You'll be able to pick new bundles each time via Your Account section.

All changes must be made before 48 hours ahead of your delivery day. After this time your order is already in process and cannot be changed. 

You can also build a custom box - just navigate to 'build a box' under 'SHOP'

settings.title: Can I try as a one-off without subscribing?
settings.answer: Yes, of course! You can skip any delivery, or pause or cancel your plan at any time by logging into Your Account.

settings.title: How will the food be delivered?
settings.answer:
Our meals are delivered in temperature-controlled boxes. We use liners made of denim offcuts and keep everything frozen with dry ice.  Our insulation is designed to keep your food frozen for up to 30 hours in transit, so don't worry if you're not at home to receive your box.

Once it arrives, you can return, compost or recycle all of our materials — all of our packaging is widely accepted by councils across the country.

We use dry ice, which evaporates en route - so don't be concerned if the pouches seem empty!

settings.title: What if my little one doesn't like the food?
settings.answer: Babies aren't going to like everything you give them, and that's totally normal (and totally frustrating!). In fact, it can take up to 20 tries of something before a baby learns a new taste. Mamamade has the most variety of any baby food delivery service, and our chefs are constantly working to release more. So whilst we encourage repeated exposure and a bit of patience, if there's something your baby truly doesn't like, we can change it up whilst keeping things interesting for both of you! For more tips on introducing new flavours, be sure to check out our blog

settings.title: Where do you deliver?
settings.answer: We currently deliver across mainland UK - although unfortunately there are some postcodes in Scotland that we aren't quite able to reach (we're working on it!). Have a look at our shipping policy for the full list of excluded postcodes.

settings.title: Rewards
settings.copy: Refer friends, join the community, and buy Mamamade meals - and earn points to spend on special treats like merch, bundles, and even designing a custom meal!

settings.title: The Meal Plan
settings.copy:
Let our expert nutritionists do the hard work for you. They'll create a baby meal plan dependant on age and weaning phases, updating it as your child grows. 

Perfect for parents who want the very best for their little ones but don't have the time to plan, shop and cook it all themselves.

settings.quote: I’m obsessed. I’ve had a few boxes from Mamamade now and have never had a single fault with any. We’re so busy sometimes that the chore of cooking dinner is too much, so I grab a mamamade meaI and don’t have the guilt of it being a ready meal - because it’s all healthy! These meals have saved my sanity on many occasions.

Delicious, convenient and eco-friendly. Our daughter has loved the Mamamade boxes of late, especially the pasta meals. We love how convenient these meals are, and easily microwavable from frozen. I particularly love the sustainable/recyclable packaging. Would love to see more options coming out in the near future!

Time saver, flavoursome, tastes fresh, healthy, reasonably priced and a flexible subscription - what’s not to love! I started my son’s weaning journey with Mamamade and we are loving it - it’s really encouraging his taste buds and ability to chew. I find the pots particularly good when I’m out and about with him.

Life changer for a busy mum of 4! I have to say I’m so pleased with my order from Mamamade. I have 4 children and so time isn’t something I have in abundance, this makes life so much easier as I always have something tasty and nutritious I can grab from the freezer and quickly heat up for the baby on days when I’m running to and from school/clubs/play dates. So pleased I came across you guys!

settings.heading: What's on the menu?
settings.copy: A parent's checklist is long enough. We'll take mealtime off your plate with our diverse range of 40 nutrient-rich meals, fabulous finger foods, and mega breakfast bowls for every stage.

settings.title: It all started when Mama made…
settings.content:
Mamamade came to life when I started introducing solids to my daughter Liba. I wanted her to have the very best - everything home-cooked, organic, plant-based, flavourful and healthy - but the reality was that I struggled to keep up with the pace of mealtimes on top of milk feeds.

I was desperate for help that didn't include breaking open the seal of a store-bought puree. Just a bit of help for those times I was out of creativity, out of time, but not willing to compromise on her health and development.

So I set to work creating a product to help parents like me.

The transition into parenthood can be hugely overwhelming. What Mamamade stands for has always been clear: to share the load and the love.

Think of us as your support system - whatever your family might look like - recognising that when it comes to nutrition, wellbeing and beyond, there's no one-size-fits-all . 

Mamamade is ready to cater to the new generation of parents. How can we help you next?

settings.heading: What's on the menu?
settings.copy: A parent's checklist is long enough. We'll take mealtime off your plate with our diverse range of over 30 nutrient-rich ready meals, mixes, fabulous finger foods and mega breakfast bowls for every stage.

settings.title: Want more control?
settings.content: We create weaning programmes which are perfectly designed for your little one’s stage of development. If you want more control or have a specific meal in mind, then you can build your own box from our range of 35 organic meals.

settings.title: A little extra sleep,  lots of peace of mind
settings.content:
Once you've ordered your baby's meal plan, we'll deliver. You just steam, microwave, mash or purée them in moments, on arrival. 

And you can pause, change or cancel at any time - amazing how far a little help can go.

settings.column-text: Tell us a bit about your baby. Nothing too personal. Just their age and eating habits
Then we can create the ideal meal-plan to suit their ongoing development
Every 2 weeks we’ll deliver your baby's healthy, freshly-frozen meal plan

settings.title: What are Mamamade Rewards?
settings.answer: Our loyalty program is designed to reward you for taking your weaning journey with us! Through the program, you will be eligible to earn points whenever you engage with the Mamamade community, such as making a purchase, referrals, reviews, and sharing your love for us on social media.

settings.title: How do I earn points?
settings.answer:
You can earn points via the following activities:


Sign Up: New customers who sign up for the program will get started with points! If you have an existing account, no worries! Your points from past purchases will automatically be transferred.

Purchases: All qualifying purchases earn points for every pound spent, depending on your tier.

Birthday Points: Celebrate your birthday with additional points! 

Refer-a-Friend: Your friend will receive a £10 voucher, and once your friend completes their purchase you'll receive points in your account. You can refer as many friends as you like! 

Reviews: Leave a service review!

Social Sharing: Follow us on Facebook or Instagram, or share us on Facebook or Instagram for points. Join our community on Facebook for even more points

settings.title: What do the tiers mean?
settings.answer:
The more you share your journey with us, the greater the rewards!

Please refer to the table above for a summary of additional benefits available to our most active members.

settings.title: What if I already have a Mamamade account?
settings.answer: Perfect! You have automatically been enrolled the Rewards program. We structured the program to be effective retroactively to February 2019. Any purchases made since that date will be automatically reflected in your account!

settings.title: Who is eligible?
settings.answer: Everyone! Just sign up for an account and start earning points! Please note that one account is allowed per customer.

settings.title: How do I redeem my points?
settings.answer: Login to your account to access your loyalty page! There, you can choose to redeem your points for vouchers, merch and other perks.

settings.title: I just ordered/signed up/engaged on social media and don't see the points on my account
settings.answer: Not to worry! Sometimes it takes our system a few days to process and apply points to your account. If you don’t see the points in your account after 3 working days, please email us at care@mamamadefood.com and we’ll take care of it for you!

settings.title: What happens if I cancel my order?
settings.answer: Any points associated with that order will be deducted from your account balance.

settings.title: Why has my balance gone down?
settings.answer: If you or one of your referrals recently canceled a purchase, this could affect your account balance.

settings.title: How do I leave the programme?
settings.answer: We’re sorry to see you go! If you would like to leave the programme, please email us at care@mamamadefood.com and we will deactivate your account. Please note that deactivating your account will cause you to lose any accrued points. You may re-enroll in the program at any time, however, your Rewards balance will reset to zero.

settings.quote: As much as I’d love to be that mum who makes every meal from scratch, between being back at work, juggling childcare with my husband, and well, life in general, sometimes I just want to grab something quick out of the freezer - and these are PERFECT. Mamamade meals are organic, plant-based and free from the big 8 allergens - which is really important for us as Sahithya has CMPA

Ordered a second box for my 9-month-old because she loves all the meals! I enjoyed making similar meals for her from scratch for the first few months of weaning, but now I’m back to work and don’t have as much time to cook. Mamamade meals allow me to feel guilt-free feeding her delicious healthy meals without spending hours in the kitchen. I’m a fan!

Lifesavers for older child with new arrival! Found this company on Insta and they have been perfect solution to getting my preschooler fed well in the early days of me taking care of our newborn. It’s taken a lot of guilt out of not being able to cook healthy meals from scratch for her and the online user experience for ordering/ delivery have been super smooth

Just started weaning my 6 and a half month old she absolutely loves the purées. This has been a lifesaver with running around after my other little one, wish I had found this company when I was weaning my now 1 and a half year old as she has milk and wheat allergy and found it hard to find foods that were healthy, packed with nutrition and low in sugar. I will definitely be ordering more for both my little people.
